sentences.en: A huge number of books are available in our library, ranging from science to archeology.
sentences.cn: 大量的书籍在我们图书馆里都有.范围跨越科学到考古学.

sentences.en: Geology here passes over the continuation of the history of man to Archeology.
sentences.cn: 地质学在此把人类历史的延续移交给考古学.

sentences.en: He has been studying archeology these thirty years.
sentences.cn: 他这三十年来一直在研究考古学.

sentences.en: He was an expert in agriculture archeology, and medicine.
sentences.cn: 他是农业考古学的专家, 和药.

sentences.en: Orientation technology has been applied into many fields such as archeology and geology.
sentences.cn: 定位技术被应用于很多领域,如考古学和地理学.

sentences.en: She made many trips to the jungles of Mexico and Central America to study archeology.
sentences.cn: 她到墨西哥和中美洲的丛林做过多次旅行,研究考古学.

sentences.en: She versed herself in Roman archeology.
She's giving a paper on archeology at the National Museum this afternoon.
sentences.cn: 今天下午她将在国家博物馆宣读一篇关于考古学的论文。

trans.tran_cn: 考古学， 古物学，文化遗物， 古迹
